tokens.text: has dynamic jump height that changes over time

generated_doNotEdit.title: Dynamic Jump
generated_doNotEdit.description: Defines a dynamic type jump control that will change jump properties based on the speed modifier of the mob. Requires `minecraft:movement.skip` to be used.

fields.title: Fast Skip Data
fields.description: The jump data used for the fast skip.

choices.title: Distance Scale
choices.description: The multiplier applied to horizontal velocity when jumping.

choices.title: Height
choices.description: The force applied vertically when jumping.

choices.title: Jump Delay
choices.description: Amount of ticks between sequential jumps.

fields.title: Regular Skip Data
fields.description: The jump data used for the regular skip.

choices.title: Distance Scale
choices.description: The multiplier applied to horizontal velocity when jumping.

choices.title: Height
choices.description: The force applied vertically when jumping.

choices.title: Jump Delay
choices.description: Amount of ticks between sequential jumps.
